Megaton heard the message from the new bot, he knew that this could be the =
start of a beautiful friendship, or a light snack if he got bored so he set=
 a course for Polartrons position fast as he could. The dragon opened a com=
m to his potential ally, "Greetings fellow Predacon, my name is Megaton, wh=
at can I do for you today?"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: kinger0=
1030@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2001 5=
:27 PM
  Subject: A new Predacon


  The arctic cirlce is a cold and desela=
te place. It had been frozen in ice 
  for 3 years. It had landed in a pod =
and got frozen in the artic waters. Out 
  of final desperation the pod fou=
nd a suitable form. A Polar Bear. The pod 
  freed itself from the ice. The=
 new predacon imerged. Lost for all these 
  years. It walked slowly up to =
the only pred signal it could find. It found 
  itself lost and sent out a =
comm. "Come in predacons. I am looking for my 
  predacon bretheren." His n=
ame Polartron. His function...unknown. 
        eGroups Sponsor 
          =
 
                    www.
